questions.question: Why are the sequences for special characters in Morse code standardized?

explanations.a: The standardization of sequences for special characters in Morse code is not intended to make communication more complex.
explanations.b: The standardization of Morse code is not designed to confuse operators.
explanations.c: The sequences for special characters in Morse code are standardized to ensure consistent and clear communication. Standardization helps prevent ambiguity and confusion during Morse code transmissions.

questions.question: What is the Morse code representation for the special character "Comma (,)"?

explanations.d: The sequence "-.-.--" is not used for the special character "Comma (,)".
